name: Fly Yourself Up - Elf Heads One Direction Games for Christmas
name_original: Fly Yourself Up - Elf Heads One Direction Games for Christmas
description:
Fly Yourself Up - Elf Heads One Direction Games for Christmas
Welcome to a thrilling Christmas gift that will keep you and your family entertained for hours. Guide your baby birds across the snow land, over beautiful landscapes, past the trees, and over snowmen. Go for the longest distance and steer clear of all the evil elf heads. This is one of the most addictive, easy to play games on android; built for lovers of jetpack joyride 2 style games and awesome fun on the countdown to Christmas.


TOP POINTS
- Endless one direction flying fun app.
- Super addictive mechanics which anyone can play.
- Compare your scores with friends in the top score leader boards.
- Collect all your baby birds for extra lives.


PLAYER REVIEWS
"me likes. this is very cute, love how the little birds follow the mother bird haha" - angry widget - Dec 2, 2013

"great way to pass the time, i made it up to 5000 meters so far, better than my mama :p" - santa ninja td - June 2, 2013


HOW TO PLAY
- Tap the screen anywhere to make your bird fly up. Let go to float down.
- Don't touch any of the evil elf heads of you lose a life.
- Lives are shown in the top left of the screen, distance in the top right.
- To get more lives just follow the actions shown in the pop-up when it's game over.


Have fun and have a Merry Santa Christmas :)
The Cobalt Play Games Team
